title: David Byrne & Brian Eno cover
content:
[http://www.everythingthathappens.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020205642/http:/www.everythingthathappens.com/ "http://www.everythingthathappens.com/")

I've made a similar font ( [BP script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020205642/http:/www.backpacker.gr/)), that's why I'm curious :-)
author: gtrianta

comments.content:
I think we have seen samples like this before, and I seem to recall that we thought they were customizations made by adding the same 'connector' to existing letters. This may be a font, but it also could quite easily have been done just by pasting the connector shape between each pair of letters.

- Mike Yanega
